name: NSGlyphGenerator
desc: An object that performs the initial, nominal glyph generation phase in the layout process.

items.name: class var shared: NSGlyphGenerator
items.desc: Returns a shared instance of NSGlyphGenerator.

items.name: func generateGlyphs(for: NSGlyphStorage, desiredNumberOfCharacters: Int, glyphIndex: UnsafeMutablePointer<Int>?, characterIndex: UnsafeMutablePointer<Int>?)
items.desc: Generates glyphs for the specified glyph storage object (NSLayoutManager by default).
